title: How do I avoid losing my Bluetooth headset?
answer:
Please do not lose the Bluetooth headset since it's a vital part of your TalkBand B2. It is recommended that you re-attach the headset to the strap immediately after ending a call or listening to music.

The TalkBand B2 has a disconnection reminder feature, that is, your phone will inform you when the Bluetooth connection between the TalkBand B2 and your phone is disconnected.(you should keep the Anti-theft reminder on in App)
